item.title: Kakalligraphy Beginner Copperplate Workshop
item.description:
This is the first of a 2 part workshop bootcamp held Sunday, August 30th at Wayfare in Costa Mesa from 10:00am - 1:00pm. This fee includes the “Beginner” learning experience, supplies as well as refreshments and goodies! This script entails learning and drawing each letter. Calligraphy is about establishing rhythmic motion while you write which gives you a consistency of shapes and letters, and spaces in between words and lines.

You will go home with the following:Basic knowledge of calligraphy and letterforms of the historic Copperplate script.

Supplies include the following: Straight Pen Holder, Various Nibs, Sumi Ink & Colored Ink, Practice Sheets, Exemplars of Copperplate Lowercase & Uppercase letters, Basic Calligraphy Knowledge Outline
